General.Name: Archies Limited
General.Description: Archies Limited engages in the retail sale of cultural, recreation, and other goods through its stores in India. The company offers flowers, cakes, chocolates, greeting cards, soft toys, stationery, gift hampers and combos, jewelry, home decor, mugs, cosmetics, as well as accessories. It operates through a distribution network that comprises company owned stores, franchisees, distributors, and retailers, as well as through online. The company offers its products under the Archies brand. It also exports its products. Archies Limited was founded in 1979 and is based in Gurugram, India.
General.Address: C-113, Naraina Industrial Area, New Delhi, India, 110028
